Login/Switch User

Use the Login or Switch User dialog box (File | Switch User) to enter a user name and password for access to a project or project database for which the login dialog box is the login source.

Note: A Login dialog box appears if VLOGIN is set as your login source. Canceling the login from this dialog box cancels the login operation. Additional login sources are not searched and you cannot log in to the project database or project.

Field Descriptions

User Name Enter your user name which has been set up previously for accessing the project database.
Password Enter your password which has been set up previously for accessing the project database.
Remember user name and password If you are logging in to a project for which the login dialog box is the login source, select to store your user name and password.
Project Database/Project Information Name: The name of the project database or project.

Location: The location of the project database or project.

See Also
